Name:
HMCS Louisburg
Juan Alejandro Acosta
Builder: Morton Engineering and Dry Dock Co. Quebec City
Fate:
Sold to Dominican Navy
Removed from active list 1978; wrecked 1979
Propulsion:
single shaft
2 × oil fired water tube boilers
1 triple-expansion reciprocating steam engine
2,750 ihp (2,050 kW)
Range: 7,400 nautical miles (13,705 km) at 10 knots (18.5 km/h)
Armament:
1 × 4 in (102 mm) QF Mk XIX naval gun
1 × 2-pounder Mk.VIII single "pom-pom"
2 × 20 mm Oerlikon single
1 × Hedgehog A/S mortar
4 × Mk.II depth charge throwers
2 × depth charge rails with 70 depth charges
